thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan wishes Salman Khan love for 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo'
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan wishes Salman Khan love for 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo'

author: PTI
title: Shah Rukh Khan wishes Salman Khan love for 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo'
text:
PTI | October 01, 2015, 18.33 pm Mumbai: Superstar Shah Rukh Khan has wished contemporary close friend Salman Khan for his upcoming Diwali release 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo'.
The Sooraj Barjatya-directed film will mark the 49-year-old superstar's collaboration with the filmmaker after a gap of 16 years. It will also see the comeback of Salman's much-loved character, Prem.
During a chat session on Twitter, a fan asked Shah Rukh, 49, what would he like to say to Salman for the film and the 'Chennai Express' actor replied, "My love and best wishes to the whole team."
'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo', which releases on November 12, also stars Sonam Kapoor, Anupam Kher Neil Nitin Mukesh and Swara Bhaskar.
The 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' star is expected to play a double role in the family drama.
Salman, meanwhile, is busy prepping for his stint as a wrestler in next year's Eid release 'Sultan', which will clash with Shah Rukh's 'Raees'.
